Assess MMR status based on IHC biomarker scores

Source: R/post_consolidation.R
assess_mmr_status.Rd

Assess MMR status based on IHC biomarker scores

Usage

assess_mmr_status(biomarkers_data)

Arguments

biomarkers_data

data frame with biomarker scores, which must include the following columns: "mlh1", "msh2", "msh6", "pms2". The function will add a new column "mmr_ihc_4" with the MMR status based on the following rules:

  • If at least one of MSH6, PMS2, MLH1, MSH2 is absent, MMR status is 'deficient'.

  • If at least one of MSH6, PMS2 is unknown (i.e., "Unk"), MMR status is 'Unk'.

  • If all of MSH6, PMS2 are present and none of MSH6, PMS2, MLH1, MSH2 is absent, MMR status is 'intact'.
